owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.color: The desired color for the pixel.

stakePixels(uint16[],uint256[],uint24[]).details: Each pixel must have a strictly larger stake than its current stake.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unstakePixel(uint16).details: Resets the pixel to no owner, zero stake, and color = 0.

changePixelColor(uint16,uint24).notice: Change the color of a pixel you already own (no extra stake).

stakePixel(uint16,uint256,uint24).notice: Stake a single pixel by providing a higher stake than the current owner.

stakePixels(uint16[],uint256[],uint24[]).notice: Batch version of stakePixel, more gas efficient for multiple pixel updates.

unstakePixel(uint16).notice: Unstake (remove your stake) from a pixel you own.

documentation.text:
@notice Batch version of stakePixel, more gas efficient for multiple pixel updates.
 @dev Each pixel must have a strictly larger stake than its current stake.
@notice Change the color of a pixel you already own (no extra stake).

@notice Unstake (remove your stake) from a pixel you own.
 @dev Resets the pixel to no owner, zero stake, and color = 0.
